No_Credentials_Provided.name: No_Credentials_Provided
No_Credentials_Provided.message: No se encontraron las credenciales de usuario en los headers.
No_Credentials_Provided.help: You should provide an username and userkey, that match with AWS Cognito user pool, in the http request headers.

User_Not_Found.name: User_Not_Found
User_Not_Found.message: No se ha encontrado datos del usuario en la base de datos.
User_Not_Found.help: There isn't information, permissions or attachment to a company, for this username in the database.

Server_Error.name: Server_Error
Server_Error.help: For details, look into the error property.

No_Route_Match.name: No_Route_Match
No_Route_Match.message: La ruta no coincide con ning√∫n endpoint.
No_Route_Match.help: End of the road reached. Check the path of the endpoint, and make sure it is correctly spelled.

No_Query_Provide.name: No_Query_Provide
No_Query_Provide.message: No se ha proporcionado ninguna query en la ruta.
No_Query_Provide.help: The path may be incomplete or missformed. Check the path, and make sure that it's formed this way: '<baseurl>/service/<indicator>/<query>'.

No_Query_Match.name: No_Query_Match
No_Query_Match.help: For this path format: '<baseurl>/service/<indicator>/<query>', this query doesn't exist in this indicator. Make sure these are the query and the indicator wich you want to request, and that they are correctly spelled.

Bad_Filters.name: Bad_Filters
Bad_Filters.help: Check the format of the filters. Filters must by passed as an object with arrays of strings in his properties. The acepted names for the properties are: 'Region', 'Local', 'Marca', 'Solucion', 'Equipo' and 'Llamada', and values are given by selecting company. Ex: {'Marca':['Marca_1','Marca_2'],'Local':['Local_1','Local_2','Local_3']}.

Bad_Username.name: Bad_Username
Bad_Username.help: The request must have a header 'username' with the username of the user, It must be string with length greater than 0.

No_Permission.name: No_Permission
No_Permission.message: El usuario no posee los permisos para solicitar este recurso.
No_Permission.help: This user doesn't have the the permission to show this resource.

No_Excel_Permission.name: No_Excel_Permission
No_Excel_Permission.message: El usuario no posee los permisos para solicitar este recurso.
No_Excel_Permission.help: This user doesn't have the the Excel permission or the permission to show the indicator that the excel points.
